data.name: Warface — "Syndicate" weapon set
data.detailed_description:
About the "Syndicate" set


The universal set of guns with a magnificent animation, which won the hearts of many Warface fans - now in Steam. Enjoy the power you wield in your hands!



The set includes iconic guns that bring victory to their skillful owner under any circumstances.



The set includes 8 types of weapons that will make a significant contribution to any battle!

Syndicate SAI GRY AR-15

SAI GRY AR-15 is ideal for battle at any distance. Due to the high damage and an increased limb multiplier, this assault rifle can easily deal even with the toughest opponent. At the same time, the rifle has a rather spacious magazine and an average rate of fire that can be used to control ammunition consumption, as well as maintain high accuracy in aiming mode.

Syndicate Saiga H.G.C. Custom

This weapon becomes a loyal companion in any tedious battles. The spacious 12-shot box magazine allows you to fight for a long time without reloading, and impressive damage and a high rate of fire will help you eliminate whole groups of enemies quickly.

Syndicate H&K MP5A5 Custom

H&K MP5A5 Custom is a reliable friend and a faithful partner for any engineer. This weapon has impressive damage, good accuracy, soft recoil, and, most importantly, it deals increased damage to the head, which is perfectly combined with a unique sighting attachment, allowing you to take out the enemy on the fly in a fraction of a second. Even the most modern helmet won’t help them at close and medium range!

Syndicate AT308

AT308 is a bolt-action sniper rifle. Thanks to its crushing damage, it allows you to achieve significant results on the battlefields. And the excellent shooting range and large-caliber cartridges that deal increased damage when hitting the limbs will not give your enemies a single chance to escape.

Syndicate Beretta ARX160

The Beretta ARX160 has a sufficiently high rate of fire for an assault rifle and at the same time has impressive damage. You will be able to kill enemies with six shots to the body from afar and with four shots from close range, guaranteed.

Syndicate Fabarm XLR5 Prestige

Fabarm XLR5 Prestige has excellent damage. As well as a good fire rate for quick elimination of your enemies. Its excellent range makes it also effective at a medium distance. The shotgun's magazine holds 7 rifle cartridges. The weapon has the ability to reload one cartridge at a time.

Syndicate Micro-Roni

The Micro-Roni Machine Gun will definitely pique the player's interest with its high damage, soft recoil, large 60-weft magazine, and superior precision when shooting from the hip.

Syndicate Remington MSR

The MSR is a bolt-action sniper rifle with the longest range that allows you to destroy enemies with a single shot. You can install several attachments on the rifle, including two unique ones: the fast Bushnell 4x scope and the Remington MSR suppressor, which increases the minimum damage.



Of course, using these weapons can earn you a lot of achievements.



After payment, the items will appear on your in-game account. Wait 15 minutes or restart the game if necessary.

data.short_description: The bright versions of the guns that will not leave you indifferent!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 415e
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 250 GTS / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3470 / AMD Athlon 240GE
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
